title: `issue-64655-extern-rust-must-allow-unwind.rs` test triggers LLVM assertion on AArch64

labels.name: A-LLVM
labels.description: Area: Code generation parts specific to LLVM. Both correctness bugs and optimization-related issues.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
When running the test suite on the `aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu` target with `llvm.assertions = true`, compiling the `issue-64655-extern-rust-must-allow-unwind.rs` test with `-C lto=fat` and `-C opt-level=0` triggers an LLVM assertion, preventing compilation:

```
---- [ui] src/test/ui/extern/issue-64655-extern-rust-must-allow-unwind.rs#fat0 stdout ----

error in revision `fat0`: test compilation failed although it shouldn't!
status: signal: 6 (SIGABRT) (core dumped)
command: "/home/ubuntu/rust/build/aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1/bin/rustc" "/home/ubuntu/rust/src/test/ui/extern/issue-64655-extern-rust-must-allow-unwind.rs" "-Zthreads=1" "--target=aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu" "--cfg" "fat0" "--error-format" "json" "--json" "future-incompat" "-Ccodegen-units=1" "-Zui-testing" "-Zdeduplicate-diagnostics=no" "-Cstrip=debuginfo" "-o" "/home/ubuntu/rust/build/aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu/test/ui/extern/issue-64655-extern-rust-must-allow-unwind.fat0/a" "-Crpath" "-Cdebuginfo=0" "-Lnative=/home/ubuntu/rust/build/aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu/native/rust-test-helpers" "-C" "opt-level=0" "-C" "lto=fat" "-L" "/home/ubuntu/rust/build/aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu/test/ui/extern/issue-64655-extern-rust-must-allow-unwind.fat0/auxiliary"
stdout: none
--- stderr -------------------------------
rustc: /home/ubuntu/rust/src/llvm-project/llvm/lib/CodeGen/GlobalISel/InstructionSelect.cpp:179: virtual bool llvm::InstructionSelect::runOnMachineFunction(llvm::MachineFunction&): Assertion `canReplaceReg(DstReg, SrcReg, MRI) && "Must be able to replace dst with src!"' failed.
------------------------------------------
```
